[blockly](./blockly.md) &gt; [IConnectionChecker](./blockly.iconnectionchecker_interface.md) &gt; [doSafetyChecks](./blockly.iconnectionchecker_interface.dosafetychecks_1_methodsignature.md)

## IConnectionChecker.doSafetyChecks() method

Check that connecting the given connections is safe, meaning that it would not break any of Blockly's basic assumptions (e.g. no self connections).

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
doSafetyChecks(a: Connection | null, b: Connection | null): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  a | [Connection](./blockly.connection_class.md) \| null | The first of the connections to check. |
|  b | [Connection](./blockly.connection_class.md) \| null | The second of the connections to check. |

<b>Returns:</b>

number

An enum with the reason this connection is safe or unsafe.
